member.summary: Reads the modification information defined in strInspectParameterFilePath, storing it in udtModList

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerInspResultsAssemblyPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerInspResultsAssembly.FilterInspectResultsByFirstHits
member.summary: Use PValue_MinLength5.py to only retain the top hit for each scan (no p-value filtering is actually applied)
member.returns: CloseOutType enum indicating success or failure

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerInspResultsAssemblyPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerInspResultsAssembly.FilterInspectResultsByPValue
member.summary: Filters the inspect results using PValue_MinLength5.py"
member.returns: CloseOutType enum indicating success or failure

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerInspResultsAssemblyPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerInspResultsAssembly.RescoreAssembledInspectResults
member.summary: Uses PValue_MinLength5.py to recompute the p-value and FScore values for Inspect results computed in parallel then reassembled In addition, filters the data on p-value of 0.1 or smaller
member.returns: CloseOutType enum indicating success or failure

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerInspResultsAssemblyPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerInspResultsAssembly.StoreToolVersionInfo
member.summary: Stores the tool version info in the database

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerInspResultsAssemblyPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerInspResultsAssembly.UpdatePTModsFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Assures that the PTMods.txt file in strInspectDir contains the modification info defined in strInspectInputFilePath Note: We run the risk that two InspectResultsAssembly tasks will run simultaneously and will both try to update PTMods.txt

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerInspResultsAssemblyPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerInspResultsAssembly.ZipInspectResults
member.summary: Stores the _inspect.txt file in _inspect_all.zip Stores the _inspect_fht.txt file in _inspect_fht.zip (but renames it to _inspect.txt before storing) Stores the _inspect_filtered.txt file in _inspect.zip (but renames it to _inspect.txt before storing)

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerInspResultsAssemblyPlugIn.clsAnalysisResourcesInspResultsAssembly.GetResources
member.summary: Retrieves files necessary for performance of Sequest analysis
